comments:
This bug don't have concrete steps to be reproduced. Try this: 

- Open php file. Make some changes, don't save
- Launch Typing preferences. Unmark some settings (PHP Doc and braces.)
- Press Apply.
- Press Restore to defaults.
- Press Apply.

The error dialog is popped.
The problem seen on Mac and Linux platforms.
The folowing exception thrown (as seen on Linux FC4):
